subject: Don't Worry so is Everyone Else - Here's what you can do about it
body:
You're in Debt - Don't 
Worry so is Everyone Else 
I don't care how much debt you're in. 
Here's 
  what you can do about it.









------------------------------------------------
To stop receiving 
  announcements from Debt-Wizard
Debt-Wizard # 189
  P.O. Box 200255
